example_note: Check right-hand side data plate / loader tower; verify axle/gearbox/engine plates if plate is missing.
Loadall: machine ID plate in specified positions; PIN encodes model/build spec.
Look for machine plate near cab/exterior; engine has its own plate; some JS docs show serial inscribed at rear frame.
Skid steer/CTL: ID plate plus stamped chassis number.
Wheel loader: chassis plate lists machine + component serials.
Telescopic wheel loader: ID plate on chassis; confirm stamped frame serial when needed.
